summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Warsaw Street, from Empire Way to 42nd Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving, grading, and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 10385 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
